attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE CHINESE CAN ACSESS PERSONAL INFO THROUGH THIS APP!!!!
attributes.review: I have been a long time, whole hearted, patriotic republican. I voted for Trump and 2016 and will vote for him again in the upcoming election. However I am extremely disappointed in this app. It’s shameful that someone would encourage our heroic president to endorse and promote this app. It took FOREVER to download, logging in was highly difficult, and I didn’t receive the notifications and updates I was promised. Not only that but the entire app is nearly impossible to use and is completely lacking secure servers. After installing and attempting to navigate this app I have become increasingly concerned that the Chinese may use this app to steal my information. I’m disappointed to see Trumps name on such a terrible and poorly thought out app.
